about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consist of 1524 240 X 240 pixel top-down character tokens, 24 uniquely designed and 1500 suitable for fighters, clerics or paladins. Also included is a 480 X 480 pixel Feral Ogre. They are suitable for use with any Fantasy roleplaying game

Volume 1 includes:
  • Cleric with 100 different head choices, each with a different selection of weapon, or weapon and shield (15 choices each)
  • Large Feral Ogre
  • 24 Heroes and Villains that are unique

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
